bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Interface and Protocol Extensions to IEEE 1284-Compliant Peripherals and Host Adapters
IEEE Standard for Interface and Protocol Extensions to IEEE 1284-Compliant Peripherals and Host Adapters

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: System extensions consistent with the implementation and functionality of IEEE Std 1284-2000 are covered. Multiport expansion architectures, daisy chains, an application and device driver programming interface architecture, and data link layer services are explored.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
